game.name: Gravity Snowman Christmas
game.description:
Xmas celebration is just approaching us very fast and like many others, you are busy in collecting all the things to make this year Christmas special than before! Why do not you need to wait for days, weeks and months when you celebrate the spirit of your favourite festival right away? Join Gravity Snowman Christmas and be prepared to take your fantasy for this celebration to the next level! Here in this brand new adventure game, you have to control a Snowman who wants to cover a long distance over the platforms.

Make sure to guide him in a way so that he does not collide with any obstacles including the TNT to stay alive until he reaches to the magic gate. You will also lose your game if he finds no platform to move forward after changing the platform. Try to get him through wisely to complete the puzzle with 3 stars rating in all 30 unique and addictive levels! All you need to do is just click the screen through mouse in PC or tap the screen in your mobile phone to switch the gravity.

He is very hopeful so do not him feel low by playing bad. The number of stars and complexities levels will keep increasing as you progress in this cool Christmas game. Take your time and switch the gravity only when you find a right platform for him! Try not to touch him with any obstacles you see along the way until you clear the level! Hey! You can play this free holiday game without download on our online game website. Stay connected with us to find new adventure simulation for free online to play!
